Symbol.Script_3D:
ws=ws/1000 ds=ds/1000 wt=wt/1000 ft=ft/1000 rr=rr/1000 tr=tr/1000 dbf=dbf/1000
!!!********* Revision of Cutting Angles
!!!********* Cut1,Cut2 gs_cutang12_bot=(-gs_cutang1_bot) !!<gs_cutang12_bot=(-gs_cutang2_bot) gs_cutang21_bot=gs_cutang2_bot !!<gs_cutang21_bot=gs_cutang1_bot gs_cutang43_up=(-gs_cutang4_up) !!<gs_cutang43_up=(-gs_cutang3_up) gs_cutang34_up=(gs_cutang3_up) !!<gs_cutang34_up=(gs_cutang4_up)
!!!********* Cut3 gs_cutang23_bot=-gs_cutang2_bot gs_cutang33_up=-gs_cutang3_up
!!!*************************************
pen gs_cont_pen material col_mat if gs_shadow=0 THEN shadow off else shadow on endif
IF gs_stationary <>`Внизу` THEN mulz -1 ang=ang*(-1) ENDIF
rotz 90 rotx 90 IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN rotx -ang IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN rotz ang
IF gs_stationary=`По центру` THEN Addy -ds/2 ENDIF
unID=1
!!!************************************* !!!************************************* HOTSPOTS !!!*************************************
hotspot 0,ds/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0,ds/2,0,unID,a,1+256 : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0,ds/2,-1,unID,a,3 : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0,ds/2,a,unID,a,2 : unID=unID+1
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN
IF gs_stationary <>`Внизу` THEN temp_ang=temp_ang*(-1) rotz -(temp_ang)
HOTSPOT 0,0,a/2,unID,temp_ang,6,ang : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,ds,a/2,unID,temp_ang,4+128,ang : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0,a/2+1,unID,temp_ang,7,ang : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -(ds)*sin(temp_ang),(ds)*cos(temp_ang),a/2,unID,temp_ang,5,ang : unID=unID+1
DEL 1
!!!!!***************** lower side IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 ELSE hotspot ws/2,0,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,ds/1,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF !!!!!***************** upper side IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,a-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a+ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a+ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 ELSE hotspot ws/2,0,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN !!!!!***************** axis points
IF gs_stationary <>`Внизу` THEN temp_ang=temp_ang*(-1) IF gs_stationary=`По центру` THEN Addy ds/2
ROTx temp_ang HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID,temp_ang,6,ang : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0,1,unID,temp_ang,4+128,ang : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,0,unID,temp_ang,7,ang : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,a/2*sin(temp_ang),a/2*cos(temp_ang),unID,temp_ang,5,ang : unID=unID+1 DEL 1
IF gs_stationary=`По центру` THEN DEL 1
!!!!!***************** lower side IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[2] THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,ds/2*tan(ang)-(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,-ds/2*tan(ang)-(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,ds/2*tan(ang)+(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,-ds/2*tan(ang)+(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 ELSE hotspot ws/2,0,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,ds/1,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,ds/2*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF !!!!!***************** upper side IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,a-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a+ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a+ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[2] THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a+ds/2*tan(ang)-(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,a-ds/2*tan(ang)-(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a+ds/2*tan(ang)+(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a-ds/2*tan(ang)+(ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up)/cos(ang)),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,0,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 ELSE hotspot ws/2,0,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot ws/2,ds/1,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,0,a+ds/2*tan(gs_cutang33_up),unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ws/2,ds/1,a-ds/2*tan(gs_cutang4_up),unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Откл.` THEN end
!!!************************************* !!!************************************* CUTPOLY !!!*************************************
dz = 0 dz2 = 0
!!!!!!*********************************** Cutplanes on the bottom
IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN !!!!!***************************** Perpendicular to Axis ROTx -90 IF ABS(gs_cutang2_bot)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang1_bot)>0.001 THEN dz=max(2*ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),2*ws/2*tan(-gs_cutang1_bot),1) CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, ws/2,ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),15, ws/2,dz,15, 0,dz,15
CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, -ws/2,ws/2*tan(-gs_cutang21_bot),15, -ws/2,dz,15, 0,dz,15 ENDIF DEL 1 ENDIF
IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[2] THEN !!!!!***************************** Along a Vertical Axis
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN ROTx -90 ROTy -ang IF ABS(gs_cutang2_bot)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang1_bot)>0.001 THEN dz=max(2*((ws/2)*sin(ang)+(ds/2)*cos(ang))*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),2*((ws/2)*sin(ang)+(ds/2)*cos(ang))*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),1) ADDy 0 CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, (ws/1)*sin(ang)+(ds/2)*cos(ang),((ws/1)*sin(ang)+(ds/2)*cos(ang))*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),15, ws/1+0.001,dz,15, 0,dz,15
CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, -ws/2-0.005,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),15, -ws/2-0.005,dz,15, 0,dz,15 DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 2 ENDIF
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN ROTx ang-90 ADDy ds/2*sin(ang) dz=max(2*ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot)+ds*sin(ang),2*ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot)+ds*sin(ang),1) dzz=dz*cos(ang)+ABS(ds*sin(ang)) CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, ws/2,ws/2*tan(gs_cutang12_bot),15, ws/2,dzz,15, 0,dzz,15 CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, -ws/2,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang21_bot),15, -ws/2,dzz,15, 0,dzz,15 DEL 2 ENDIF
ENDIF
IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN !!!!!***************************** Along a Horizontal Axis IF ABS(gs_cutang1_bot)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang2_bot)>0.001 THEN dz=abs(max((-ds/1)*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),(ds/1)*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),1)) ADDy ds/2 ROTy 90 ROTz 90 IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN CUTPOLYA 6,0,0, (ds/1),-dz,15, (ds/1),(ds/1)*tan(gs_cutang1_bot),15, 0,0,15, -(ds/1),-(ds/1)*tan(gs_cutang23_bot),15, -(ds/1),-dz,15, 0,-dz,15 ELSE CUTPOLYA 6,0,0, (ds/1),-dz,15, (ds/1),(ds/1)*tan(-gs_cutang23_bot),15, 0,0,15, -(ds/1),-(ds/1)*tan(-gs_cutang1_bot),15, -(ds/1),-dz,15, 0,-dz,15 ENDIF DEL 3 ENDIF ENDIF
!!!!!!*********************************** Cutplanes on the top
ADDz a IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN !!!!!***************************** Perpendicular to Axis ROTx -90 IF ABS(gs_cutang4_up)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang3_up)>0.001 THEN dz2=max(1,ABS(2*((ws/2)*tan(gs_cutang43_up))),ABS(2*((ws/2)*tan(-gs_cutang34_up)))) CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, ws/2,-ws/2*tan(-gs_cutang34_up),15, ws/2,-dz2,15, 0,-dz2,15 CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, -ws/2,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up),15, -ws/2,-dz2,15, 0,-dz2,15 ENDIF DEL 1 ENDIF
IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[2] THEN !!!!!***************************** Along a Vertical Axis IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN ADDz -ds/2*tan(ang)
ROTx ang-90 dz2=max(ABS(2*ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up)+ds*sin(ang)),ABS(2*ws/2*tan(gs_cutang34_up)+ds*sin(ang)),1) dzz2=dz2*cos(ang)+ABS(ds*sin(ang)) CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, ws/2,-ws/2*tan(-gs_cutang34_up),15, ws/2,-dzz2,15, 0,-dzz2,15 CUTPOLYA 4,0,0, 0,0,15, -ws/2,-ws/2*tan(gs_cutang43_up),15, -ws/2,-dzz2,15, 0,-dzz2,15 DEL 1 IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN DEL 1 ENDIF
IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN !!!!!***************************** Along a Horizontal Axis IF ABS(gs_cutang3_up)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang4_up)>0.001 THEN dz2=max(ABS(ds/1*tan(gs_cutang33_up)),ABS(ds/1*tan(gs_cutang4_up)),1) ADDy ds/2 ROTy 90 ROTz 90 IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN CUTPOLYA 6,0,0, (ds/1)/cos(gs_cutang33_up),dz2,15, (ds/1)/cos(gs_cutang4_up),((ds/1)/cos(gs_cutang4_up))*tan(gs_cutang33_up),15, 0,0,15, -(ds/1)/cos(gs_cutang33_up),((ds/1)/cos(gs_cutang33_up))*tan(-gs_cutang4_up),15, -(ds/1)/cos(gs_cutang33_up),dz2,15, 0,dz2,15 ELSE CUTPOLYA 6,0,0, (ds/1)/cos(-gs_cutang4_up),dz2,15, (ds/1)/cos(-gs_cutang33_up),((ds/1)/cos(-gs_cutang33_up))*tan(-gs_cutang4_up),15, 0,0,15, -(ds/1)/cos(-gs_cutang4_up),((ds/1)/cos(-gs_cutang4_up))*tan(gs_cutang33_up),15, -(ds/1)/cos(-gs_cutang4_up),dz2,15, 0,dz2,15 ENDIF DEL 3 ENDIF ENDIF
DEL 1
ADDz -dz
!!!************************************* !!!************************************* Simple !!!*************************************
FlangeAng=ATN(((ds-dbf)/2-rr-ft)/(ws/2-wt-rr))
FlangeSlope1=ft-((ws/2)*tan(FlangeAng)) FlangeSlope2=(ws-wt)*tan(FlangeAng) FlangeSlope3=(ws-wt-rr-tr)*tan(FlangeAng)
IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Простой` OR glob_context=2 THEN ADDx -ws/2
PRISM_ 9,a+dz+dz2, ws,0,15, ws,FlangeSlope1,15, wt,FlangeSlope1+FlangeSlope2,15, wt,ds-FlangeSlope1-FlangeSlope2,15, ws,ds-FlangeSlope1,15, ws,ds,15, 0,ds,15, 0,0,15, ws,0,-1
DEL 1 ENDIF
!!!************************************* !!!************************************* Detailed !!!*************************************
IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Детальный` AND glob_context<>2 THEN ADDx -ws/2
ToeStartY2=(ds-dbf)/2-rr-FlangeSlope3-tr
!!! Curved Resolution S=90/gs_resol FOR k=0 TO 90 STEP S PUT ws-tr+tr*cos(k),ToeStartY2+tr*sin(k),79 NEXT k FOR k=0 TO 90 STEP S PUT wt+rr-rr*sin(k),(ds-dbf)/2-rr*cos(k),79 NEXT k FOR k=90 TO 180 STEP S PUT wt+rr-rr*sin(k),ds-(ds-dbf)/2-rr*cos(k),79 NEXT k FOR k=270 TO 360 STEP S PUT ws-tr+tr*cos(k),ds-ToeStartY2+tr*sin(k),79 NEXT k PRISM_ 7+NSP/3, a+dz+dz2, ws,0,15, ws,ToeStartY2,79, GET(NSP/4), GET(NSP/3), GET(NSP/2), GET(NSP), ws,ds-ToeStartY2,79, ws,ds,15, 0,ds,15, 0,0,15, ws,0,-1
DEL 1 ENDIF
DEL 3
IF ABS(gs_cutang1_bot)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang2_bot)>0.001 THEN IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN :CUTEND:CUTEND: ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[2] AND gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN :CUTEND:CUTEND: ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN :CUTEND: ENDIF ENDIF !IF gs_cutang1_bot>=0 or gs_cutang2_bot>=0 THEN IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[2] AND gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN :CUTEND:CUTEND: ENDIF !ENDIF
IF ABS(gs_cutang3_up)>0.001 or ABS(gs_cutang4_up)>0.001 THEN IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[1] THEN :CUTEND:CUTEND: ENDIF IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[3] THEN :CUTEND: ENDIF ENDIF !IF gs_cutang3_up>=0 or gs_cutang4_up>=0 THEN IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[2] AND gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN :CUTEND:CUTEND: ENDIF !ENDIF
DEL 1
IF gs_stationary <>`Внизу` THEN DEl 1 IF gs_stationary=`По центру` THEN DEL 1
End
Symbol.Script_2D:
ws=ws/1000 ds=ds/1000 wt=wt/1000 ft=ft/1000 rr=rr/1000
!!!!ROTATION Angle=0 LABEL 100: !!!! AXIS LABEL 100: !!!! gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[1] LABEL 110: !!!! gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[2] LABEL 110: !!!! gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[1] LABEL 120: !!!! gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[2] LABEL 120: !!!! gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[3] LABEL 130: !!!! gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[3] LABEL 140:
!!!!ROTATION Angle=90 OR Angle=-90 LABEL 200: !!!! gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] LABEL 210: !!!! gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] LABEL 220: !!!!ROTATION 0<Angle<90 OR -90<Angle<0 LABEL 300:
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type LINE_TYPE 1
IF ang=0 THEN GOTO 100 IF ang=90 OR ang=-90 THEN GOTO 200 IF ang>0 AND ang<90 OR ang<0 AND ang>-90 THEN GOTO 300
100:
unID=100
IF (axis=1) THEN PEN axis_line_pen LINE_TYPE axis_line_type LINE2 0, 0, A*cos(ang),0 HOTLINE2 0, 0, A*cos(ang),0 ENDIF
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, a, 1+256: unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length) HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, a, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a, 0, unID, a, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 a/2, 0,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length/2)
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type LINE_TYPE 1
IF axis=1 AND only_axis=0 OR axis=0 THEN
110:
IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[1] OR gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[2] THEN
!!! *** Cut. Angle (1) IF gs_cutang1_bot=0 THEN P1xCutMod12=0 ELSE P1xCutMod12=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang1_bot) ENDIF
!!! *** Cut. Angle (2) IF gs_cutang2_bot=0 THEN P2xCutMod12=0 ELSE P2xCutMod12=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang2_bot) ENDIF
!!! *** Contour POLY2_b 6, 1, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, P1xCutMod12,ws/2,1, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,1, P2xCutMod12,-ws/2,1, 0,0,-1
!!! *** Background Fill IF GLOB_CONTEXT<>22 THEN !! (DO NOT SHOW FILL IN HOTSPOT EDITING) POLY2_b 6, 2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,0, P1xCutMod12,ws/2,0, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,0, P2xCutMod12,-ws/2,0, 0,0,-1 ENDIF
!!! *** Hotspots !!! *** Cut. Angle (1) P1CutMod12_RR=(ws/2)/COS(gs_cutang1_bot)
IF gs_cut_planes=1 THEN ROT2 -30 unID=110 HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, temp_cutang1_bot, 6+512, gs_cutang1_bot : unID=unID+1 !Center HOTSPOT2 -P1CutMod12_RR,0, unID, temp_cutang1_bot, 4+128, gs_cutang1_bot : unID=unID+1 !Base HOTSPOT2 -COS(temp_cutang1_bot) * P1CutMod12_RR, SIN(temp_cutang1_bot) * P1CutMod12_RR, unID, temp_cutang1_bot, 5, gs_cutang1_bot : unID=unID+1 !Move DEL 1 ELSE unID=113 HOTSPOT2 0,ws/2 : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
!!! *** Cut. Angle (2) P2CutMod12_RR=(ws/2)/COS(gs_cutang2_bot)
IF gs_cut_planes=1 THEN ROT2 30 unID=114 HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, temp_cutang2_bot, 6, gs_cutang2_bot : unID=unID+1 !Center HOTSPOT2 -P2CutMod12_RR,0, unID, temp_cutang2_bot, 4+128, gs_cutang2_bot : unID=unID+1 !Base HOTSPOT2 -COS(temp_cutang2_bot) * P2CutMod12_RR, -SIN(temp_cutang2_bot) * P2CutMod12_RR, unID, temp_cutang2_bot, 5, gs_cutang2_bot : unID=unID+1 !Move DEL 1 ELSE unID=117 HOTSPOT2 0,-ws/2 : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
ENDIF
120:
IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[1] OR gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[2] THEN
!!! *** Cut. Angle (3) IF gs_cutang3_up=0 THEN P3xCutMod12=0 ELSE P3xCutMod12=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang3_up) ENDIF
!!! *** Cut. Angle (4) IF gs_cutang4_up=0 THEN P4xCutMod12=0 ELSE P4xCutMod12=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang4_up) ENDIF
!!! *** Contour POLY2_b 6, 1, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A,0,1, A-P3xCutMod12,ws/2,1, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,1, A-P4xCutMod12,-ws/2,1, A,0,-1
!!! *** Contour and Background Fill IF GLOB_CONTEXT<>22 THEN !! (DO NOT SHOW FILL IN HOTSPOT EDITING) POLY2_b 6, 2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A,0,0, A-P3xCutMod12,ws/2,0, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,0, A-P4xCutMod12,-ws/2,0, A,0,-1 ENDIF
!!! *** Hotspots !!! *** Cut. Angle (3) P3CutMod3_RR=(ws/2)/COS(gs_cutang3_up)
IF gs_cut_planes=1 THEN
ADD2 A,0 ROT2 30 unID=120 HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, temp_cutang3_up, 6, gs_cutang3_up : unID=unID+1 !Center HOTSPOT2 P3CutMod3_RR,0, unID, temp_cutang3_up, 4+128, gs_cutang3_up : unID=unID+1 !Base HOTSPOT2 COS(temp_cutang3_up) * P3CutMod3_RR, SIN(temp_cutang3_up) * P3CutMod3_RR, unID, temp_cutang3_up, 5, gs_cutang3_up : unID=unID+1 !Move DEL 2 ELSE unID=123 HOTSPOT2 a,ws/2 : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
!!! *** Cut. Angle (4) P4CutMod3_RR=(ws/2)/COS(gs_cutang4_up)
IF gs_cut_planes=1 THEN ADD2 A,0 ROT2 -30 unID=124 HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, temp_cutang4_up, 6+512, gs_cutang4_up : unID=unID+1 !Center HOTSPOT2 P4CutMod3_RR,0, unID, temp_cutang4_up, 4+128, gs_cutang4_up : unID=unID+1 !Base HOTSPOT2 COS(temp_cutang4_up) * P4CutMod3_RR, -SIN(temp_cutang4_up) * P4CutMod3_RR, unID, temp_cutang4_up, 5, gs_cutang4_up : unID=unID+1 !Move DEL 2
ELSE unID=127 HOTSPOT2 a,-ws/2 : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
ENDIF
130:
unID=130
IF gs_cutmode_bot=cut_mod_mtr[3]THEN
IF gs_cutang1_bot=0 THEN P1xCutMod3=0 ELSE P1xCutMod3=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang1_bot) ENDIF
IF gs_cutang2_bot=0 THEN P2xCutMod3=0 ELSE P2xCutMod3=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang2_bot) ENDIF
!!! *** MIN. Horiz. Length
tempP12CutMod3=MIN(0,P1xCutMod3,P2xCutMod3)
!!! *** Lines Types IF P1xCutMod3<0 THEN tempLineOrigo=DashedLineType ELSE tempLineOrigo=1 ENDIF
IF P2xCutMod3<P1xCutMod3 AND P2xCutMod3<=0 THEN tempLineAng2=1 ELSE tempLineAng2=DashedLineType ENDIF
!!! *** ORIGO LINE_TYPE tempLineOrigo IF gs_cutang1_bot<>-gs_cutang2_bot OR -gs_cutang1_bot<>gs_cutang2_bot THEN LINE2 0,ws/2,0,-ws/2
!!! *** Cut. Angle (1) LINE_TYPE 1 LINE2 P1xCutMod3,ws/2,P1xCutMod3,-ws/2 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 P1xCutMod3,0,unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Cut. Angle (2) LINE_TYPE tempLineAng2 IF gs_cutang1_bot<>gs_cutang2_bot THEN LINE2 P2xCutMod3,ws/2,P2xCutMod3,-ws/2 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 P2xCutMod3,0,unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
LINE_TYPE 1
!!! *** Contour POLY2_b 5, 1, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, tempP12CutMod3,ws/2,1, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,1, tempP12CutMod3,-ws/2,0, tempP12CutMod3,ws/2,-1
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 tempP12CutMod3,ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 tempP12CutMod3,-ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Background Fill IF GLOB_CONTEXT<>22 THEN !! (DO NOT SHOW FILL IN HOTSPOT EDITING) POLY2_b 5, 2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, tempP12CutMod3,ws/2,0, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,0, tempP12CutMod3,-ws/2,0, tempP12CutMod3,ws/2,-1 ENDIF
ENDIF
140:
unID=140
IF gs_cutmode_up=cut_mod_mtr[3]THEN
IF gs_cutang3_up=0 THEN P3xCutMod3=0 ELSE P3xCutMod3=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang3_up) ENDIF
IF gs_cutang4_up=0 THEN P4xCutMod3=0 ELSE P4xCutMod3=(ws/2)*TAN(gs_cutang4_up) ENDIF
!!! *** MIN. Horiz. Length
tempP34CutMod3=MIN(0,P3xCutMod3,P4xCutMod3)
!!! *** Lines Types IF P3xCutMod3<0 THEN tempLineOrigo=DashedLineType ELSE tempLineOrigo=1 ENDIF
IF P4xCutMod3<P3xCutMod3 AND P4xCutMod3<=0 THEN tempLineAng4=1 ELSE tempLineAng4=DashedLineType ENDIF
!!! *** ORIGO LINE_TYPE tempLineOrigo IF gs_cutang3_up<>-gs_cutang4_up OR -gs_cutang3_up<>gs_cutang4_up THEN LINE2 A,ws/2,A,-ws/2
!!! *** Cut. Angle (3) LINE_TYPE 1 LINE2 A-P3xCutMod3,ws/2,A-P3xCutMod3,-ws/2 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 A-P3xCutMod3,0,unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Cut. Angle (4) LINE_TYPE tempLineAng4 IF gs_cutang3_up<>gs_cutang4_up THEN LINE2 A-P4xCutMod3,ws/2,A-P4xCutMod3,-ws/2 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 A-P4xCutMod3,0,unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
LINE_TYPE 1
!!! *** Contour POLY2_b 5, 1, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A-tempP34CutMod3,ws/2,1, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,1, A-tempP34CutMod3,-ws/2,1, A-tempP34CutMod3,ws/2,-1
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 A-tempP34CutMod3,ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 A-tempP34CutMod3,-ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Background Fill IF GLOB_CONTEXT<>22 THEN !! (DO NOT SHOW FILL IN HOTSPOT EDITING) POLY2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A-tempP34CutMod3,ws/2,0, A/2,ws/2,0, A/2,-ws/2,0, A-tempP34CutMod3,-ws/2,0, A-tempP34CutMod3,ws/2,-1 ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF
150: END
200:
210:
unID=210
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN
PEN gs_cont_pen IF axis=1 AND only_axis=0 OR axis=0 THEN PROJECT2{2} 3,270,3+32, gs_back_pen,0,0,0
IF gs_stationary=`Вверху` AND ang=90 OR gs_stationary=`Внизу` AND ang=-90 THEN ADD2 0,ds/2 IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` AND ang=90 OR gs_stationary=`Вверху` AND ang=-90 THEN ADD2 0,-ds/2
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, a, 1+256: unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length) HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, a, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a, 0, unID, a, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 a/2, 0,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length/2)
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 0, ds/2,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! BOUNDING BOX HOTSPOT2 A, ds/2,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A, -ds/2,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -ds/2,unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
IF (axis=1) THEN PEN axis_line_pen LINE_TYPE axis_line_type
LINE2 0, 0, A,0 HOTLINE2 0, 0, A,0 ENDIF
IF gs_stationary <> `По центру` THEN DEL 1
PEN gs_cont_pen
ENDIF
220:
unID=220
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN
PEN gs_cont_pen
IF gs_stationary=`Вверху` AND ang=90 OR gs_stationary=`Внизу` AND ang=-90 THEN ADD2 0,-ws/2 IF gs_stationary=`По центру` THEN ADD2 -ds/2,-ws/2 IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` AND ang=90 OR gs_stationary=`Вверху` AND ang=-90 THEN ADD2 -ds,-ws/2
HOTSPOT2 ds/2,ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! ORIGO IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 ds,ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 0,ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1
IF axis=1 AND only_axis=0 OR axis=0 THEN
POLY2_b 9, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1+32, 0,ws,1+32, ft,ws,1+32, ft,wt,1+32, ds-ft,wt,1+32, ds-ft,ws,1+32, ds,ws,1+32, ds,0,1+32, 0,0,-1
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 ds,ws,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! BOUNDING BOX HOTSPOT2 ds,0,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,ws,unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF
IF (axis=1) THEN PEN axis_line_pen LINE_TYPE axis_line_type
LINE2 -0.05, ws/2, ds+0.05,ws/2 LINE2 ds/2, -0.05, ds/2,ws+0.05
PEN gs_cont_pen
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 ds/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 ds/2,ws,unID : unID=unID+1
ENDIF
DEL 1
PEN gs_cont_pen
ENDIF END
300:
unID=300
PEN gs_cont_pen
IF axis=1 AND only_axis=0 OR axis=0 THEN PROJECT2{2} 3,270,3+32, gs_back_pen,0,0,0 IF (axis=1) THEN PEN axis_line_pen LINE_TYPE axis_line_type IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN LINE2 0, 0, A,0 HOTLINE2 0, 0, A,0
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, a, 1+256: unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length) HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, a, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a, 0, unID, a, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 A/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length/2)
ENDIF IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN
IF gs_stationary=`Внизу` THEN ADD2 -ds/2*sin(ang),0 IF gs_stationary=`Вверху` THEN ADD2 ds/2*sin(ang),0
LINE2 0, 0, A*cos(ang),0 HOTLINE2 0, 0, A*cos(ang),0
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, a_temp, 1+256, A: unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length/2) HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, a_temp, 3, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a_temp, 0, unID, a_temp, 2, A: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 A*cos(ang)/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! AXIS (Length)
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 0,ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 !!! BOUNDING BOX HOTSPOT2 0,-ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A*cos(ang),ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A*cos(ang),-ws/2,unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF IF gs_stationary <> `По центру` THEN DEL 1 ENDIF ENDIF PEN gs_cont_pen END
Symbol.Script_1D:
DIM rot_axis_mtr[2] rot_axis_mtr[1]=`Вдоль оси` rot_axis_mtr[2]=`Вдоль сечения`
DIM cut_mod_mtr[3] cut_mod_mtr[1]=`Перпендикулярно оси` cut_mod_mtr[2]=`Вдоль вертикальной оси` cut_mod_mtr[3]=`Вдоль горизонтальной оси`
DIM pol_matr [60] !!! necessary matrix for the 2D background polygon IF gs_cut_planes=0 THEN :gs_cutang1_bot=0 :gs_cutang2_bot=0:gs_cutang3_up=0 :gs_cutang4_up=0:ENDIF
IF ang>90 and ang<=225 THEN: Parameters ang=90:ang=90: ENDIF IF ang>225 THEN: Parameters ang=0:ang=0: ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
sor=19 ! Number of Sections dim vekt[19]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="Profile" or siz_mtr[1]="" THEN szelv=open("text", "rusk_a_11.txt", "separator='\t', mode=ro, Library") File_Dependence "rusk_a_11.txt" for i=2 to sor+1 n=input(szelv, i, 2, vekt[i-1]) next i
vekt[19] = `СПЕЦИАЛЬНЫЕ` PARAMETERS siz_mtr=vekt siz_mtr=vekt
close szelv ENDIF
IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 1 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 1 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 2 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 2 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 3 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 3 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 4 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 4 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 5 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 5
parameters gs_UIPicts[1] = 15 !! "gs_AngleCut3Bottom_O" !!(1) parameters gs_UIPicts[2] = 21 !! "gs_AngleCut3Up_O" !!(2) parameters gs_UIPicts[3] = 1 !! "gs_AngleCut12Bottom_C" !!(3) parameters gs_UIPicts[4] = 7 !! "gs_AngleCut12Up_C" !!(4) parameters gs_UIPicts[5] = 25 !! "gs_AxisRotBottom_C" !!(5) parameters gs_UIPicts[6] = 43 !! "gs_AxisRotUp_C" !!(6) parameters gs_UIPicts[7] = 54 !! "gs_Cut1Bottom_O" !!(7) parameters gs_UIPicts[8] = 60 !! "gs_Cut1Up_O" !!(8) parameters gs_UIPicts[9] = 66 !! "gs_Cut2Bottom_O" !!(9) parameters gs_UIPicts[10] = 72 !! "gs_Cut2Up_O" !!(10) parameters gs_UIPicts[11] = 78 !! "gs_Cut3Bottom_O" !!(11) parameters gs_UIPicts[12] = 84 !! "gs_Cut3Up_O" !!(12) parameters gs_UIPicts[13] = 90 !! "gs_SectRotBottom_O" !!(13) parameters gs_UIPicts[14] = 102 !! "gs_SectRotUp_O" !!(14)
parameters gs_UIPicts[15] = 34 !! "gs_AxisRotCentre_C" !!(15) parameters gs_UIPicts[16] = 96 !! "gs_SectRotCentre_O" !!(16)
IF gs_cont_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=90 IF gs_fill_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [1,) IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Простой` THEN LOCK "gs_resol"
values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Простой`,`Детальный`,`Откл.` values "gs_rot_axis" rot_axis_mtr values "gs_stationary" `Вверху`,`По центру`,`Внизу`
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] or ang>60 THEN values "gs_cutmode_bot" cut_mod_mtr[1],cut_mod_mtr[3] values "gs_cutmode_up" cut_mod_mtr[1],cut_mod_mtr[3] ELSE values "gs_cutmode_bot" cut_mod_mtr values "gs_cutmode_up" cut_mod_mtr ENDIF
if gs_cut_planes=0 then lock "gs_cutmode_bot","gs_cutang1_bot", "gs_cutang2_bot","gs_cutmode_up", "gs_cutang3_up","gs_cutang4_up"
IF Glob_Modpar_Name="gs_rot_axis" THEN IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN Parameters a_temp=A*cos(ang) IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN Parameters a_temp=A ELSE IF Glob_Modpar_Name="A" or Glob_Modpar_Name="ang" OR Glob_Modpar_Name="temp_ang" THEN IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN Parameters a_temp=A*cos(ang) IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN Parameters a_temp=A PARAMETERS aa_ = 0 ELSE IF NOT(aa_) or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="a_temp" THEN IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN Parameters A=a_temp/cos(ang) IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN Parameters A=a_temp ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
values "Profile" siz_mtr !!!vekt
if axis=0 THEN LOCK "only_axis" LOCK "axis_line_type" LOCK "axis_line_pen" ENDIF
IF ang=0 AND gs_cutmode_bot<>cut_mod_mtr[3] AND gs_cutmode_up<>cut_mod_mtr[3] OR ang<>0 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "DashedLineType" ENDIF
!!!IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="Profile" THEN if Profile<>`СПЕЦИАЛЬНЫЕ` & Profile <> lastProfile then
lastProfile = Profile parameters lastProfile = Profile
szelv=open("text", "rusk_a_11.txt", "separator='\t', mode=ro, Library") for i=2 to sor+1 n=input(szelv, i, 2, ker) if Profile=ker then n=input(szelv, i, 3, omassm, ods, ows, owt, oft, orr, otr, oas, odbf, osmix, oewx, opwx, orix, osmiy, oewy, opwy, oriy ) i=sor+1 ! force loop end endif next i close szelv
parameters B=ows/1000 parameters ZZYZX=ods/1000 parameters massm=omassm massm=omassm parameters ds=ods ds=ods parameters ws=ows ws=ows parameters wt=owt wt=owt parameters ft=oft ft=oft parameters rr=orr rr=orr parameters tr=otr tr=otr parameters dbf=odbf dbf=odbf parameters smix=osmix smix=osmix parameters smiy=osmiy smiy=osmiy parameters rix=orix rix=orix parameters riy=oriy riy=oriy parameters ewx=oewx ewx=oewx parameters ewy=oewy ewy=oewy parameters pwx=opwx pwx=opwx parameters pwy=opwy pwy=opwy parameters as=oas as=oas parameters fmass=massm*A fmass=massm*A endif !!ENDIF
if Profile<>`СПЕЦИАЛЬНЫЕ` then lock "B" lock "ZZYZX" lock "massm" lock "ds" lock "ws" lock "wt" lock "ft" lock "rr" lock "tr" lock "dbf" lock "smix" lock "smiy" lock "rix" lock "riy" lock "ewx" lock "ewy" lock "pwx" lock "pwy" lock "as" lock "fmass" endif
if Profile=`СПЕЦИАЛЬНЫЕ` then parameters massm=massm parameters ds=ds parameters ws=ws parameters wt=wt parameters ft=ft parameters rr=rr parameters tr=tr parameters dbf=dbf parameters smix=smix parameters smiy=smiy parameters rix=rix parameters riy=riy parameters ewx=ewx parameters ewy=ewy parameters pwx=pwx parameters pwy=pwy parameters as=as parameters fmass=massm*A parameters B=ws/1000 parameters ZZYZX=ds/1000 lock "B" lock "ZZYZX" endif
!!! *** Rotation Angle
VALUES "ang" range[-90,90]
if temp_ang >= 270 and temp_ang <= 360 THEN PARAMETERS temp_ang = 0 !! Bottom if temp_ang < 270 and temp_ang >= 180 THEN PARAMETERS temp_ang = 180
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_ang" THEN PARAMETERS ang = temp_ang - 90 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_ang = ang + 90 ENDIF
!!! *** Cutting Angles
VALUES "gs_cutang1_bot" range[-60,60] VALUES "gs_cutang2_bot" range[-60,60] VALUES "gs_cutang3_up" range[-60,60] VALUES "gs_cutang4_up" range[-60,60]
if temp_cutang1_bot > 120 and temp_cutang1_bot < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang1_bot = 120 if temp_cutang1_bot < 360 and temp_cutang1_bot >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang1_bot = 0
if temp_cutang2_bot > 120 and temp_cutang2_bot < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang2_bot = 120 if temp_cutang2_bot < 360 and temp_cutang2_bot >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang2_bot = 0
if temp_cutang3_up > 120 and temp_cutang3_up < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang3_up = 120 if temp_cutang3_up < 360 and temp_cutang3_up >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang3_up = 0
if temp_cutang4_up > 120 and temp_cutang4_up < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang4_up = 120 if temp_cutang4_up < 360 and temp_cutang4_up >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang4_up = 0
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang1_bot" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang1_bot = temp_cutang1_bot - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang1_bot = gs_cutang1_bot + 60 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang2_bot" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang2_bot = temp_cutang2_bot - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang2_bot = gs_cutang2_bot + 60 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang3_up" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang3_up = temp_cutang3_up - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang3_up = gs_cutang3_up + 60 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang4_up" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang4_up = temp_cutang4_up - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang4_up = gs_cutang4_up + 60 ENDIF
call "FM_types" parameters all
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_dialog `Пар-ры колонны`
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page ui_page gs_ui_current_page
CALL "ui_buttons" parameters gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page, gs_ui_but_cont = 5, gs_ui_but_txt = gs_ui_but_txt
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 1 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 1
UI_PICT 1, 215, 70, 126, 170,1 ! UI_C2sect.png
UI_Style 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Размер`, 16, 44, 196, 13 UI_Style 0,0 UI_OUTFIELD `Длина`, 16, 90, 120, 13 UI_tooltip `Длина балки (мм)`
UI_INFIELD "Profile", 31, 62, 84, 20 UI_INFIELD "A", 31, 108, 66, 20 UI_tooltip `Длина балки (мм)`
UI_INFIELD "ws", 258, 240, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Ширина профиля (мм)` UI_INFIELD "ds", 152, 140, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Высота профиля (мм)` UI_INFIELD "wt", 258, 46, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Толщина стенки (мм)` UI_INFIELD "ft", 346, 82, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Толщина фланца (мм)` UI_INFIELD "rr", 346, 168, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Радиус основания (мм)` UI_INFIELD "tr", 346, 208, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Радиус подошвы (мм)` UI_INFIELD "dbf", 152, 182, 56, 20 UI_tooltip `Глубина между полочками (мм)`
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 2 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 2
UI_OUTFIELD `Момент инерции плоск.x-x `, 15, 72, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Мом.инерции плоск.x-x (см4)` UI_OUTFIELD `Момент инерции плоск.y-y`, 15, 102, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Мом.инерции плоск.y-y (см4)` UI_OUTFIELD `Радиус инерции x-x`, 15, 130, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Радиус инерции x-x (см)` UI_OUTFIELD `Радиус инерции y-y`, 15, 160, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Радиус инерции x-x (см)` UI_OUTFIELD `Модуль упругости x-x`, 15, 188, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Модуль упругости x-x (см3)` UI_OUTFIELD `Модуль упругости y-y`, 15, 218, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Модуль упругости y-y (см3)`
UI_OUTFIELD `Модуль пластич. x-x`, 239, 72, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Модуль пластич. x-x (см3)` UI_OUTFIELD `Модуль пластич. y-y`, 239, 102, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Модуль пластич. y-y (см3)` UI_OUTFIELD `Площадь сечения`, 239, 130, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Площадь сечения (см2)` UI_OUTFIELD `Масса на метр`, 239, 160, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Масса на метр (кг/м)` UI_OUTFIELD `Масса`, 239, 188, 132, 13 UI_tooltip `Масса (кг)`
